body.name: Wireless Doorbell, 1,000ft Range Loud Enough with 5Volume Levels and Mute Mode Door Chimes LED Flashing
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 40 mins
features: 【Modern and Practical Design】Our wireless doorbell comes with stylish appearance and practical functions. Lightweight and sensitive, there are illuminated halo and LED strobe alerts on the receiver. Operating range up to 1000ft in open area, offer you fast indication, which ensures you to hear the bell and answer the door in time.

【5 Volume 52 Ringtones For Your Choice】 There are 52 ringtones and 5 adjustable volume levels(included silent mode) to choose from. The 52 kinds of ringtones can be chosen as per you like. With adjustable volume from 20db to 110 db, it will suitable for most of your room.
【Easy Installation】 No batteries & plug receiver required. The easily installed transmitter will be set up in only several minutes.And there are 2 ways to place your receiver-by sticker & screws.
【More Than a Door Bell !】Expand applications by yourself, e.g. use it as a dog or a cat training assistant device.

【Reminder & WARRANTY】If continuous button pressing is required, please press again the button after the ring sound stopping rather than continuous button.You will get a full refund or a brand new replacement if you are not satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Sleek and Easy
reviews.reviewText: The doorbell is super sleek with the white and gold trim. I love the ease of use. This receiver does not emit annoying humming noise when plugged in like one I tried before. This receiver is completely silent until you want to hear it (when you ring the doorbell, of course)! Ot has three volume levels, but the loudest setting isn’t that loud. It is not as loud as another doorbell I have tried. I know because with my other doorbell, the person ringing the doorbell could hear the speaker through the door. With this one, it is Boyd loud enough to be heard even when the receiver is plugged in on the other side of the door. So, keep that in mind when considering if this is loud enough for you. Otherwise, this a fantastic doorbell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really liked how easy it was to set up this doorbell. It wasn't like trying to figure out how to run a cyclotron or anything, but I am on the impatient side, and prefer something be "plug and play" as opposed to needing to tinker with it, or having to fuss a lot with the instructions.It took roughly all of five minutes to have the doorbell up and running after taking it out of the box. I opened the push-button part with a flathead screwdriver, and installed the battery, as per the instructions. I then anticipated the doorbell button and the body of the doorbell itself needing to be paired, or synced. But to my surprise, the doorbell just- worked, right away. After plugging in the main doorbell component to the wall, I pressed the button part by mistake. The plugged-in component then serenaded us with a soft, velvety "ding- dong... ding- dong." The tone wasn't tinny or irritating at all, much to my relief. The default volume setting is a tiny bit on the loud side, but that is fine, as I walk around all day wearing Bluetooth headphones, and am a bit deaf in one ear after my years of being in a band, before people started wearing earplugs to gigs.Our last wireless doorbell's chime, in comparison to this model's, was cheap-sounding, and sharp. This new doorbell- well--- the only way I know how to describe its gentle chiming is-- "classy." The old doorbell's ringing made us jump. This one seems to sing to us, gently announcing "good news... good news." I know it sounds silly- but it's the truth!I decided to use a strip of strong velcro to attach the push button part to the molding around the outside of my apartment door. My other wireless doorbell kept falling off of the molding- the paint on it is a very high gloss- and eventually it just stopped working. I had used the tape that came with the last doorbell to stick it on the moulding, and that didn't work well. So I by-passed the double-sided sticky pad that was in the box with this new doorbell, and stuck it on there with the strong velcro. The button for this doorbell is now very snugly attached, but can be removed if need be.The doorbell is working great. The other day we had several deliveries, and the handyman needing to come and go throughout the afternoon, and this new doorbell got a workout. But the sound of it never became tiresome. Its chimes are always pleasant to the ear. It's also easy to hear from any part of the apartment. The design of the doorbell and button part are nice and sleek-looking (I ordered the white one, as my front door moulding is white) and esthetically pleasing.Pros: easy to get up and running; no complicated set-up; doorbell components synced themselves; agreeable chiming sound (we just left it on the default "ding dong" one, as it was so nice); attractive.Cons: none that I can find- and I highly recommend it. For the price, it's a great little doorbell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutting-Edge Convenience! Impressive Loudness! Experience the Power of a Wireless Doorbell!
reviews.reviewText: The Wireless Doorbell with its impressive 1,000ft range and loud, adjustable volume levels has truly exceeded my expectations. This doorbell is a game-changer, providing not only an extensive range but also the flexibility to choose from 5 different volume levels. The expansive range ensures that I never miss a visitor, even when I'm at a considerable distance from the door. The doorbell's volume, which can be adjusted to my preference, is more than sufficient to grab my attention, making it an ideal solution for various household setups. The sleek design adds a modern touch to my entryway, blending seamlessly with the overall aesthetics. The ease of installation is worth noting, and the wireless feature eliminates the hassle of dealing with cords and complicated setups. Making it a standout choice for anyone seeking a reliable and modern doorbell solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🎵 Just plug it in… stick it on… 🎵
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly easy to setup/connect. Just plug in the receiver and peel/stick the door bell. Unit has a great sound. Very reasonable solution if your home didn’t come with a door bell. Everything you need is supplied… adhesive and battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was pleased to see the price of this product and was expecting it to be very cheap and fake, I was surprised to see it was very nice and easy to use! Overall, I’m very happy with my purchase!!!
